document_data.mainbody:
The Undeath domain was a deity domain that granted divine spellcasters like clerics with undeath-related spells and powers.
They could turn or rebuke undead additional times per day.
Novice spellcasters were able to use the detect undead, desecrate, and animate dead spells. Clerics of some experience could cast death ward, circle of doom, and create undead. Those that were masters in this domain had access to control undead, create greater undead, and energy drain.
